column5: Hey gang,  I'm looking to rent a 2 or 3 bedroom cottage for a few days this month. I've already got an email out to the folks at Lakair, but just in case they are booked, has anyone rented at any of the other camps/resorts in the area? If so, any recommendations?  Has anyone been to Lucky Strike?  Thanks
Alot of the board members also like Memquisit.
West Arm lodge is also in the area, Subury chapter of muskies Canada had last years outing their and accomidations were great
Our Lion's club has been going to Shuswap the past 10 years. Heinz and Gerta are first rate.
